The Future of ColourThe world’s first 100% natural, high-performance biodegradable colour platform. 






Discover our products



























Shining responsibly— like no other 



 No mica in our pigments means no child labour. No titania means that human health is not put at risk. No dye equals less pollution and better for the planet. In fact, our pigments are entirely biodegradable with the least possible impact on the environment, from sourcing till end-of-life. 







 



















 







Inspired by nature  — to better embrace it 



Our pigments utilize the physical structure that gives birds and butterflies their magnificient colours, eliminating the need for toxic chemicals. It is time to make space for the most striking and beautiful colours of nature without harming the earth.						



















 Made with plant-based cellulose  — nothing else 



							Cellulose is one of the most abundant materials on earth and is found in trees and crops all over the world. Our pigments have the highest naturality index and allow your products to reach carbon-neutrality more easily while maintaining performance.						







 


























Unleashing light
 — with laser-focused power and performance 



We harness naturally reflective plant-based cellulose crystals to elegantly design biodegradable coloured materials that deliver finesse and performance to the most sustainable products. 



















 






A new material withendless possibilities 



Our pigments find use in a myriad of applications where colour vibrancy and effect are needed. 














Cosmetics 
& Personal care

& Foil

Backed by leading investors 










 









 









 









 









 









 









 









 









 









 









 


























Transformative colour technology— that elevates your design.
 



We unlocked nature’s elemental colour code to create visually stunning, fade-resistant, and biodegradable pigments redefining natural colours. 






Discover Our Technology






















Tiny particles withbig goals 



Our pigments support sustainable development. 











































Change is coming.Let's adapt together.

Nature-inspired.Science driven 



 A breakthrough colouration technology. 











 










 



Bioinspired 



Inspired by nature, we use the same striking structural colours as many plants and animals. The properties of our pigments make them the most sustainable while delivering on performance, colour and shine.						







 



Sustainable 



							The appearance of our products relies upon the material that nature has evolved for displaying vibrant colours: cellulose. Present in the cell walls of all the plants, cellulose is fully biodegradable, renewable, and even edible.						







 



Performance 



Our products have highly reflective photonic properties, exploited to reflect striking structural colours that are fade-resistant, usable in the same contexts as conventional pigments, glitters, and sequins.						

































A new era fornatural colour 



Inspired by nature, we unlocked an elemental colour code to create visually stunning, fade-resistant, biodegradable products redefining how natural colours are perceived. 























 







Structural colour— nature's intelligence. 



Brightly coloured animals and plants, including many birds, beetles, and butterflies, owe their striking hues to elaborate microscopically structured surfaces that interfere with light and dazzle the eye.Plant-based cellulose is one such material. In the right conditions, cellulose, one of the most abundant resources on Earth, can develop microscopic structural textures that shines brilliantly. 







					Plastic-free				















					Titania- and mica-free				
































Nature's beauty made simpleLike a soap bubble 



Have you ever noticed how a soap bubble swirls with bright colours without the need for dyes? We utilise the same principle behind this phenomenon to make vibrant colours.Keeping your products clean and playful has never been easier with performant, non-toxic, natural colours and effects. 




















 












How it allstarted 







Professor Silvia Vignolini, Sparxell’s Chief Scientific Advisor, first encountered the fruits of Polia condensata (pictured) in the collection of the British Museum: more than a century after the fruits were first collected, their colours were as vibrant as the day they were picked.It turns out that the colour vividness occurs because of the peculiar arrangement of the cellulose chains in the cell wall of the fruits, giving the fruit an intense structural colouration — one of the brightest colours of all biological materials.Dr Benjamin Droguet,  Sparxell’s Founder & CEO, as part Professor Vignolini’s group at the University of Cambridge, demonstrates the use of industrial machinery to replicate the same vibrant colours found in nature using plant-based cellulose.Sparxell was then born to provide nature’s most exquisite and sustainable colours at commercial scale. 







					Plant-based				















					Biodegradable				


























 


















Award-winning— breakthrough material science company. 



Sparxell’s sustainable technology has received numerous awards and mentions. 










 




					#Top21toWatch 2022					








 




					CSAR Award 2021					








 




					Finalist Enabling Technology — Emerging Technologies competition 2021					








 




					1st Place UK & Top 16 Global 2022					








 




					Winner — Sustainable Solutions Collaborative 2023					








 




					Winner — Ray of Hope 2023					








 




					International Prize — Innovation in forestry and wood technologies 2022					








 




					1st Prize — Chris Abell Postdoc Business Plan Competition 2022					








 




					1st Prize — Fitzelerate 2022					








 




					La French Tech London 2022					








 




					1st Place — Trinity Bradfield Prize 2021					
































How we replicatenature's colours 



Sparxell’s patented technology delivers the latest material science innovation.  



 







1 Cellulose rich sources such as wood pulp provide the building blocks of Sparxell’s pigments and glitter. The core crystalline part of cellulose is extracted from these sources and dispersed into water randomly. 







2 After prepping the cellulose crystals in water, they self assemble from a chaotic (isotropic) configuration into an ordered (cholesteric) state upon drying. Using our patented technology, the densely packed crystals now forms a film that reflects light and colour over a large area. 







3 By controlling the interactions between the crystals, the cellulose film can be tailor-made to match a specific appearance. The film can then be ground and shaped into a range of sizes and forms —voilà! This is how we replicate nature’s most vibrant colours and effects. 

































A glimpse ofour productS 



							Engineering the self-assembly properties of cellulose, we can mimic the same specific vibrant hues found in nature and achieve endless other variations of colours and effects. Our pigments are available in various sizes, from fine microscopic pigment powders to glitters, sequins and larger films.						






Get In Touch











 






























Transformative colour technology— that elevates your design. 



A performative, non-toxic, natural colour platform that enables better product design and systemic sustainable change.  














Our Impact

Future Friendlycolours & effects 












 






Answering the callfor non-toxic colourants. 











 Mounting concerns over harmful, toxic chemicals means companies are faced with sustainability imperatives across multiple supply chains: reduce emissions, protect human health, and the environment.For designers who rely on high-performance products, sourcing option for colours and effects – from dyes, pigments, pearls, glitters, and other shimmers – that do not contain mined or petroleum-based ingredients are extremely difficult.Sparxell is answering the call for better colours by using bio-inspired photonic technology to make plant-based, biodegradable products – pigments, glitters, films & foils, and sequins – that will drive lasting positive impact and pioneer a new era of sustainable and high-performance products. 


































The best of nature— the exact same way nature intended. 



We provide the world’s perfect performant pigment from plant, as a natural alternative to synthetic dyes, inorganic pigments, and microplastic particles. 






See Our Products



























Lowering emissions— 100 % renewable and natural. 



Made from cellulose, one of the most abundant plant materials on Earth. Biodegradable. Renewable.Our pigments contribute to curb the dependency on finite resources and high-GHG emission materials like metals and minerals. 



































Preserving biodiversity— like no other. 



Our plastic-free and toxin-free pigments have been shown in model studies to have some of the lowest impacts on flora and fauna at the end of life. Our pigments help safeguarding biodiversity, human health and contribute to long-term environmental conservation. 



























Enabling circularity— circular by design. 



Upcyclable, sustainable from sourcing till end-of-life, our products can be recycled and reintroduced into manufacturing processes with ease and the least impact. 










































Circularity is a process 



“Our products tackle microplastic, chemical and contaminated water pollution, toxicity issues, land depletion, hard-to-abate materials often extracted with exploitative labour practices.
We are on a mission to shape a greener, more ethical, and responsible future across many key industrial sectors and society at scale.”
– Benjamin Droguet, CEO 






Our Technology































Partner with us— let's drive change together. 






Contact Us




























 




© Sparxell Inc. 2023. All rights reserved.

Colours that
astonish 



 The power of nature now in your hands. 











 






At the pinnacle
of sustainable elegance 



Our versatile range of products bring a touch of extravagance with brilliant colours, shimmer and sparkle for limitless creative possibilities. Inspired by nature and developed using our technology based on the latest material science innovation, let your journey toward innovation, sustainability, and excellence shine brightly. 











 







Pigment powders 



These versatile powders, pearls and glitter, available in a vast array of colours and a wide range of sizes, are enriched with a captivating luster, enchanting charm. They bring brilliant colours and a delightful shimmer, making them ideal for creating captivating finishes and formulations.  



Applications include Fashion and Apparel, Cosmetics & Personal Care, Packaging, Arts & crafts, Decoration, Automotive Coatings, Stationary and Paper Products, Coatings & Paint, Food & Beverage. 











 







Formulated liquids 



Elevate your projects with our formulated products. Designed for your specific applications, our cutting-edge technology sets new standards for performance and sustainability. Enhance and transform the visual and functional aspects of your products with our commitment to excellence, sustainability and innovation. 



Applications include Cosmetics and Personal Care, Packaging, Automotive, Consumer Electronics, Home Décor, Architecture, Healthcare, Food and Beverage, Paints and Coatings, Fashion and Apparel, Automotive and Lubricants. 











 







Foils & Ribbons 



Our foils and ribbons bring forth a variety of rich colours, a touch of subtle luster, and a hint of shimmer. These shades gracefully interact with light, producing an appealing finish that’s bound to catch the eye. 



Applications include Packaging, Print and Graphics, Textiles and Apparel, Cosmetics and Personal Care, Labels and Stickers, Automotive, Stationary, Arts and Crafts 











 







Specialty shapes 



From components to embellishment, our specialty shapes, including sequins, are designed to add a touch of uniqueness to your designs. Infused with precision and craftsmanship, these specialty formats bring forth an array of options that stand out with brilliance, vibrance and flair. 



Applications include Fashion and Apparel, Textiles and Home Décor, Arts and Crafts, Cosmetics and Personal Care, Event Décor, Footwear, Embroidery and Textile Art, Packaging, Jewellery. 











 







Advanced functionality
 



Created for performance, our advanced range delivers functionality and sophistication sustainably. Explore for instance the advantages of the UV and IR-reflective properties of our products. A remarkable impact all from plants. 



Applications include Cosmetics and Personal Care, Fashion and Apparel, Packaging, Printing and Publishing, Automotive, Electronics, Industrial and Manufacturing, Entertainment and Media, Architecture, Food and Beverage. 




































Custom made
to any specification 



hue-rotate(0deg)


 



Use the slider to choose your colour and customise the products to your specification. Our products are available in unlimited colours and multiple sizes, produced by our breakthrough, bio-inspired technology.Reach out for specific inquiries, visiting our contact page. 


















We work towards
Sustainability & Impact 







 



Clean & Sustainable 



100% natural & biodegradable. No mica, no titania, nor synthetic dye, just plant. 







 



High Performing 



We help you achieve unparalleled visual richness, durability & technical performance, with our long-lasting, ultra-light and interchangeable in formula products. 







 



Circular 



Cellulose is one of Earth’s most abundant materials (think trees, food waste & discarded crops & plant material). Our pigments are a part of the new circular economy—fully sustainable from source till end-of-life. 









































Visionary Innovation 



Sparxell designs, engineers, and manufactures visually striking, ultra-sustainable biomimetic pigments, biodegradable glitter, and special effect biomaterials for high-end consumer products. 


























How to
Adopt 



We offer full-service research & application assistance, including design R&I, prototyping and manufacturing for a wide range of category-disrupting products. 




















 





Technical consultation 







 













       





Application trials 





















                                           





Samples & Prototyping 





















  





Production & Delivery 


























Transformative colour technology— that elevates your design.

Elegant material.limitless possibilities 



 A transformative colour platform for consumer products that outcompete. 






See Our Products























Elevate Your Design 



Reach performance with our biomimetic products for technical triumph and visual masterpiece. 































Imagine any colour— off-the-shelf or custom-made 



From solids to directional effects, pearls to shiny metallics, creativity and design freedom can fully be expressed. 














Our Services



















Cosmetics & Personal care 



Widespread concerns over harmful and damaging ingredients have led brands to look for naturally-derived alternatives. We offer revolutionary plant-based products & for skincare, colour cosmetics, photoprotection & makeup. 



































Fashion & Textiles 



Fashion designers and textile transformers struggle to find performant colours for textiles, accessories and hard goods that do not compromise their sustainability efforts and limit their design freedom.Sparxell’s high-performance natural pigments, films & foils, and sequins and other embellishment elements enable truly sustainable garment production. 































Biomimetic Pigmentswith endless possibilities 



The only 100% natural alternative to synthetic pigments, mined metals & minerals, and microplastic products. 























Coatings & paint 



Greener coatings with durable, plant-based pigments.  



































Packaging 



Eye-catching, coloured and decorated packaging for a circular economy. 



























Food & Beverages 



Safe, natural colourants for healthier food and beverage choices. 



































Arts & Crafts 



Plant-based products inspiring safe and creative expression.  
























 














We bring the science. You bring the design. 



Our material engineers and scientists can help you optimize  your colour supply chain & make the transition to sustainable products. 






Our Services
